availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, grocer. Massachusetts native. Married to Laurina P. Holm Gardner in Cumberland County, Maine, on May 15, 1841. Father of Charles H. Gardner, Elizabeth C. Gardner, Catherine Gardner, Sarah H. Gardner, and Edward A. Gardner, Jr. Merchant in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Grocer in Louisville in 1860. Grocer in partnership with William O. Gardner in Gardner & Company in Louisville in 1861. Grocer in partnership with Charles H. Gardner in Gardner & Company in Louisville in 1865.
